name: Yellowknives
place: Dettah and Ndilǫ, Northwest Territories, Canada
description: The Yellowknives Dene sky culture is the result of fieldwork with Northern Dene peoples, investigating how they conceptualize and integrate the sky into systems of knowledge, practices, cosmology, and spirituality. Characteristic is a principal constellation: the incarnated spirit of a Traveler figure who circled the world in Distant Time.

constellations.certainty: Most stars are identified, and a pictograph is drawn in the source [cannon2021northerndene]. The line figure here follows the star path of each body part listed, connecting them. The text lists eta UMa in the right arm, incorrectly; corrected acc. drawing to h UMa.
constellations.description: Humanoid constellation composed of 11 groups of named stars that span 76 degrees across the sky. It is said that an ordinary person shot him with an arrow, and the impact broke his back, which is why he has his hands thrown above his head with fingers splayed out. He kicked his legs and feet into the air, which pushed the sky up to where it is now. His head (ups UMa), the place where he was hit with the arrow (or the arrow itself) (g UMa), and the quiver for arrows (tet Boo) are unconnected.

constellations.certainty: Most stars are identified, and a pictograph is drawn in the source [cannon2021northerndene]. The line figure here follows the star path of each body part listed, connecting them. The list of stars for 'his body' doesn't match the drawing; the list is used here. Removed the link bet UMa to gam UMa, which is drawn but unwarranted by the description.
constellations.description: An elder from Ndilǫ identified a variation of the constellation: a big headless man. The handle of the Big Dipper is Yìda's right arm, and the Big Dipper cup forms his upper torso.

constellations.certainty: The stars are identified, but no lines. It is not clear whether it should be lined (it isn't here).
constellations.description: Yı̀da’s wife is an important character in Northern Dene Traveler stories.

* alf Boo.description: Used as morning star, as a spiritual entity that morning prayers are directed towards, and as an important referent to determine the departure time for traveling and hunting at dawn.

* g UMa.english: Place Where He Was Hit With Arrow
